base_template.name: Basic Tailwind CSS Template
base_template.html:
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
</head>

<body class="bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 font-sans leading-normal tracking-normal">

        {% block content %}        
        {% endblock %}


</body>

</html>

template.name: Agent Specs
template.template_md:
{% block content %}
# ![Company Logo](https://github.com/nuvemquery/reporting-templates/blob/master/assets/gbtnavy%20(256).png?raw=true)
---

{{ client.name }}

---

Agent List

{% for item in data_sources.agentsList %} {% endfor %}
Device Name User Device OS Device Platform Device Ram Drive Info
{{ item.hostname }} {{ item.last_logged_in_user }} {{ item.operating_system }} {{item.wmi_detail.cpu[0][0].Name if item.wmi_detail and item.wmi_detail.cpu and item.wmi_detail.cpu[0][0].Name else 'N/A'}} {{ item.total_ram }}GB {{item.disks[0].device if item.disks and item.disks[0].device else 'N/A'}} {{item.disks[0].total if item.disks and item.disks[0].total else 'N/A'}}
{% endblock %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentsList:
    filter:
      site__client_id: '{{client.id}}'
    model: agent
    only:
    - hostname
    - last_logged_in_user
    - operating_system
    - wmi_detail
    - total_ram
    - disks
